description: Canonical definition of all governance-critical oversight parameters. This file is used to configure the OversightParameterRegistry (OPR) at boot time.

P01_RISK_FLOOR.description: Maximum permitted deviation from baseline risk metric.

MAX_ENTROPY_DEBT.description: Threshold for initiating forced self-correction procedures.

SANDBOX_TIMEOUT_MS.description: Timeout for independent code execution sandbox processes.

E05_MAX_GENERATION_CYCLES.description: Maximum cycles allowed for self-evolutionary generation attempt before aborting.
